MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mynydd Isa, affecting properties in Mold Road. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network checks required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:43PM on 4th November 2020.
